ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] hate + new favorite mob
ygData.msgSnippet: Yet another mob ripped straight out of the AD&D monster manual =P We got ranger boots off one tonight. Also Cryo legs (snore) and Verm bracer. Killed many
ygData.messageBody:
Yet another mob ripped straight out of the AD&D monster manual =P
We got ranger boots off one tonight. Also Cryo legs (snore) and Verm bracer.
Killed many scorns, but ended up with 1 pair of pee-colored pants, which
went to my friend.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan

>
>Hrm - that mob had been slated (named as a "mimic") for Unrest,
>pre-release. I guess they decided to recycle it for Hate...
>
>Talies the Wanderer
